certificates.title: Supervised Machine Learning
certificates.description: Introductory course focused on supervised learning algorithms (regression and classification), evaluation metrics, and model selection techniques with practical Python exercises.

certificates.title: Data Science
certificates.description: Comprehensive introduction to Data Science covering data preprocessing, feature engineering, exploratory data analysis and visualization. Includes hands-on work with supervised and unsupervised algorithms (regression, classification, clustering) and model evaluation using Python libraries.

certificates.title: Python
certificates.description: Fundamentals of Python programming: data types, operators, control flow, strings, collections, functions, modularity, and basic object-oriented concepts; reinforced with HackerRank practice problems.

certificates.title: SQL
certificates.description: Core SQL skills: writing SELECT queries, filtering, JOINs, GROUP BY and aggregation, and basic data manipulation for relational databases.

certificates.title: Introduction to Large Language Model
certificates.description: 12-week course by IIT Madras covering the theory and architectures of large language models (transformers), fine-tuning approaches, and practical NLP applications.

certificates.title: Data handling and visualization using MATLAB
certificates.issuer: Madhav Institute of Technology and Science
certificates.description: Data handling and visualization using MATLAB: importing/exporting data, preprocessing, plotting and reporting; awarded 'A' grade.

certificates.title: Python for Data Science
certificates.description: Python for Data Science: hands-on training in data cleaning with pandas, exploratory data analysis, visualization, and introductory machine learning workflows using scikit-learn; project-based learning and notebooks.

certificates.title: All India NCAT
certificates.description: I achieved an All India Rank of 1886 in NCAT.
